titleStmt.title: Dagon's-downfall; or The great idol digged up root and branch.
titleStmt.author: Crab, Roger, 1621?-1680.

notesStmt.note: With an inverted woodcut on title page.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "written by Roger Crab", "7ber [i.e. September] 19".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
